scriptcat-workspace-selected: Workspace has selected script: {0}, use command {1} to change
scriptcat-auto-mode-enabled: Switched to auto-detect mode, will monitor all *.user.js files
scriptcat-semantic-highlight-prompt: ScriptCat recommends enabling semantic highlighting for better UserScript metadata highlighting experience
scriptcat-semantic-highlight-info: You can always enable semantic highlighting by searching for 'Semantic Highlighting' in settings and setting it to true.
scriptcat-ws-started-owner: ScriptCat WebSocket service started on port {0} (Main Window)
scriptcat-ws-started-secondary: ScriptCat WebSocket service is running in another window, current window will use file communication mode (Secondary Window)
scriptcat-ws-existing: ScriptCat WebSocket service is running in another window on port {0}
scriptcat-file-synced-skip: Don't show again for this file
